item.description:
KI COFFEEHOUSE PARTY
TC: Dwight Jarrat ( djarrat@hotmail.com )
EVENT: Come to another "KI Coffeehouse Party", beginning at 8:00 pm.
This is a new effort by KI to create a friendly place for people to socialize on
a Saturday night. With singer/guitarist David Harris, featuring songs of James
Taylor, The Beatles, and more. Plus desserts and time to shmooze.
MEET: Congregation Kehillath Israel (KI), 384 Harvard Street, Brookline.
Event will take place in Landers Hall. Enter by walking down the sidewalk
along the far right side of the synagogue (when facing it from the street).
RSVP: Not required
COST: $8

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: KI COFFEEHOUSE PARTY
